solution_line_template: Jameson has {track_medals} x {swimming_multiplier} = <<{track_medals}*{swimming_multiplier}={swimming_medals}>>{swimming_medals} medals for swimming.
He has a total of {track_medals} + {swimming_medals} = <<{track_medals}+{swimming_medals}={track_and_swimming_medals}>>{track_and_swimming_medals} medals for track and swimming.
Thus, he has {total_medals} - {track_and_swimming_medals} = <<{total_medals}-{track_and_swimming_medals}={badminton_medals}>>{badminton_medals} medals for badminton.
